attributes.action: DON'T change organ donation from opt in to opt out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The change would be disaster. Inevitably organs will be removed from people whose families object and this will be an unacceptable ordeal for the bereaved. More should be done to normalise the donation of organs, to make donation common and normal, but never to be carried out without asking. Presently if you Opt-in you take the responsibility of checking with your family yourself. If you haven’t Opted-in then the hospital will ask your next of kin. If you change to the opposite, the hospital does not need to ask, they can just take and if you have not registered your opt-out and your family have reason to object, or maybe you have an unrecorded disease then tough, your family's knowledge or views don’t matter. If they have another family member who also needs an organ, they have no say who gets the organ, no say in anything.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
